short_summary: Request for Quotation (RFQ), Specific Requirement: Software Maintenance & Support
description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of software maintenance and support.
full_summary:
**Title**: 
Request for Quotation (RFQ) for Erwin Data Modeler Maintenance and Support
**Description**: 
A tender notification for the supply and delivery of maintenance and support services for the Erwin Data Modeler software. The end user entity for this requirement is the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC). 

**Tender Details** 
* **Reference Number**: WS4394928438-Doc4406800131
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4394928438
* **Publication Date**: January 23, 2024
* **Tender Closure Date**: February 7, 2024 @ 14:00:00 (14:00:00)
* **Tender Status**: Expired

**Procurement Terms**
* **Procurement Category**: GD (Goods and Services)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

**Contracting Entity Information**
* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**End User Information**
* **End User Entity Name**: Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC)
* **End User Address**: K.W. Neatby Bldg, 960 Carling Ave, Ottawa, Ontario, K1Y 4X2, Canada

**Contact Information**
* **Contact Person Name**: Kwesi Wiafe 
* **Contact Person Email**: kwesi.wiafe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Contact Person Phone**: N/A
* **Contact Person Address**: N/A

**Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18594435?extsite=MTg1OTQ0MzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Trade Agreements**: 
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions:** 
* National Capital Region (NCR)
  **Last edited on Mar 27, 2024, by **Software Dev. Tech. Writer**__. You can now share this rewritten entry  with the contractors. Just be sure to verify the details of the tender notice before you share it. I wish you success with this tender.
